Chrome Developer Tools

Getting Started

How to access the DevTools

The DevIools are organised into task-oriented groups in the toolbar at the top of the window. Each toolbar item and corresponding panel let you work with a specific type of page or app information, including DOM elements, resources, and sources. Timeline demo: Diagnosing forced synchronous layout

This demo shows how you can use the Timeline to identify a kind of performance bottle-neck called 'forced synchronous layouts', The demo application animates several images back and forth using requestAnimationFrame
